comments:
I installed the sdk3.1 en all plugins as indicated on the ORM download page.
When trying to do something related with the plugin you get an error. For
instance adding persistence to a project you get: This operation is currently
nog available. The eclipse error log shows as first error the following stack trace:

org.osgi.framework.BundleException: The activator
org.eclipse.jsr220orm.ui.OrmUiPlugin for bundle org.eclipse.jsr220orm.ui is invalid
at
org.eclipse.osgi.framework.internal.core.AbstractBundle.loadBundleActivator(AbstractBundle.java:151)
...
Root exception:
java.lang.UnsupportedClassVersionError: org/eclipse/jsr220orm/ui/OrmUiPlugin
(Unsupported major.minor version 49.0)
...

JSR220-ORM requires JDK 1.5. Please start eclipse with JDK1.5 using the -vm arg.
eg: ./eclipse -vm /usr/local/jdk1.5.0_02/bin/java
See http://www.eclipse.org/jsr220orm/downloads.html for all requirements.
Starting eclipse with a 1.5 vm works (updated the website to be clear on this)
